questionListItems.title: What are the steps to come onboard the scheme?

answer.body:
There are two (2) key stages of participation:


1) Stage 1 - Register your interest with

  • the CDC Ambassadors, or

  • b) the Digital Ambassadors from the SG Digital Office,

  • c) register your interest with your CDC (https://vouchers.cdc.gov.sg/merchants/info/#merchantreginterest)


2) Stage 2 - A CDC Ambassador will get in touch with you for the sign up and onboarding. Training will be provided during the onboarding process.

questionListItems.title: I was approached by individuals claiming to be Ambassadors for the CDC Vouchers Scheme. How can I verify that they are authorised personnel?

answer.body: To assist merchants in the registration of interests and onboarding process, IMDA's Digital Ambassadors and CDC Ambassadors are deployed island-wide. The IMDA's Digital Ambassadors can be identified by the uniform and button badge that they will be wearing during deployment and can be identified by the official lanyard and button badge during deployment as shown below.

questionListItems.title: How will customers know that they can use the vouchers at my place of business?

answer.body: All participating merchants and hawkers will be featured on go.gov.sg/cdcvouchersmerchants so residents can conveniently search for shops nearest to them. You are required to prominently display the CDC Voucher decal at their stall / shop front for visibility to customers.

questionListItems.title: How can I register interest to participate in the CDC Vouchers Scheme?

answer.body:
Please register your interest with your CDC using the respective CDC forms below. To find out which CDC your stall falls under, please key in your postal code using the district locator. An officer will be in touch with you within 14 calendar days upon submission of the form on the status of your registration.


  • Central Singapore CDC https://go.gov.sg/csmerchantreg

  • North East CDC https://go.gov.sg/nemerchantreg

  • North West CDC https://go.gov.sg/nwmerchantreg

  • South East CDC https://go.gov.sg/semerchantreg

  • South West CDC https://go.gov.sg/swmerchantreg


In case of enquiries, please contact our hotline at 6225 5322. The operating hours of our hotline are:

  • 8am to 6pm, Mondays to Sundays, except Public Holidays (PH)

  • 8.00 am to 1.00 pm on eve of the 3 public holidays, namely New Year, Chinese New Year and Christmas

questionListItems.title: I had previously participated as a merchant in CDC Vouchers 2021 and 2022. Do I auto-qualify or do I still need to register to join CDC Vouchers Scheme 2023 and future tranches? Also will I receive the $30 onboarding incentive again for CDC Vouchers Scheme 2023 and future tranches?

answer.body: No, there is no need to register again to participate in CDC Vouchers 2023 if you have already been onboarded to the two previous CDC Vouchers schemes. Our CDC Ambassadors will reach out to you to update on the new scheme and provide the welcome letter.

questionListItems.title: What do I need to prepare to sign-up and onboard as a new participating heartland merchant/hawker?

answer.body: During the sign-up process, we will obtain your business contact information (such as bank account details, contact information and UEN used by your business). If you wish to provide other personal information to us (such as your NRIC No.), we may accept the information. You will need to prepare supporting documents for your bank account or PayNow proxy (handphone, NRIC or UEN), depending on which mode of payment was chosen. If you are an iPhone user, please also prepare your Apple ID and password on hand as you will need this to be able to download the RedeemSG Merchant app to accept the CDC Vouchers.

questionListItems.title: How do I gain access to the app?

answer.body: You may download the app 'RedeemSG Merchant' on Apple App Store or Google Play Store. A CDC Ambassador will get in touch with you for the sign up and onboarding. Training will be provided during the onboarding process, and you will be provided with your unique shop code to access the app.

questionListItems.title: Can I share my RedeemSG Merchant account with my staff? How do they login to the app?

answer.body: Your staff can download the RedeemSG Merchant app using their own device, and log-in using the same shop code that was issued to you by the CDC Ambassador or sent to you via SMS. Please get all your staff to download the app and login via your Shop Code to ensure that customers can redeem their vouchers with your staff even if you are not at the stall.

questionListItems.title: I currently have multiple shop branches. Am I able to track each of the shops' transactions individually and ensure only one branch's staff can see that branch's records?

answer.body: Yes, in order to enable this, you can sign-up each branch as a single shop account and that shop will be issued its own shop code. Staff will then only be able to see that particular shop's transactions.

questionListItems.title: What is the MyPassion Mobile Application for?

answer.body:
MyPAssion is an application of the People's Association. PAssion Members can view the latest PAssion merchants, deals and privileges via the application.


With MyPAssion, members can login via Singpass to download their PAssion e-Card(s) to enjoy greater convenience at PAssion Merchants that accept the PAssion e-Card as a form of identity.


Be informed of the latest PAssion promotions near you, and easily find their locations. Users can sign up for PAssion e-Membership, check your yuu Points and book PA facilities.

questionListItems.title: Why are there only a few modules within the app?

answer.body:
The features of the app will be released in phases. In the current release, the features accessible by PAssion Card members/ users are as follows:

  • Experience easier and more secure logins with Singpass /Singpass mobile

  • Enjoy the convenience of one-touch access to their PAssion e-Card(s)

  • Receive PAssion deals every week

  • Access PAssion merchant privileges 365 days a year

  • Discover deals near you

  • [NEW!] PAssion membership sign-up, including new FREE e-Membership

  • [NEW!] Book PA facilities on-the-go

  • [NEW!] Access PAssion Rewards, including yuu Points and TapForMore points


Members/ users can expect more features and functionalities in the next few releases which would allow users to participate in contests to win attractive prizes, register for courses and events amongst others.

questionListItems.title: Why do I need to login to the MyPAssion Mobile App via Singpass?

answer.body: Login via Singpass is required for authentication purposes. For existing PAssion Card members, you will be able to access your profile and PAssion e-Card(s) once you have logged in via Singpass.

questionListItems.title: What is the purpose of the PAssion e-card in the app?

answer.body:
With MyPAssion, members can login via Singpass to download their PAssion e-Card(s) to enjoy greater convenience at PAssion Merchants that accept the PAssion e-Card as a form of identity.


[NOTE: PAssion e-Card cannot be used for PAssion CARES participation]

questionListItems.title: I signed up as a member today. How long do I need to wait before I am able to view my PAssion e-card via the app?

answer.body:
(I) PHYSICAL EZ-LINK CARD


Your PAssion e-Card will be reflected in e-Card module within 3 working/business days. Depending on the mode (online or over-the-counter) of sign-up and membership type (PAssion Card/ PAssion Co-Brand Card/ PAssion POSB Debit Card/ PAssion Silver Concession Card etc), the 16-digit CAN number may take up to a few more working days to be reflected in the e-Card module.


If you have signed up via MyPAssion app, you may access your PAssion e-Card by logging into MyPAssion app with your Singpass 30 minutes after your registration.


(II) PASSION E-MEMBERSHIP


You may access your PAssion e-Card in the e-Card module in 15 - 30 minutes after your successful registration in MyPAssion app. If you are unable to view your PAssion e-Card, log out of your profile and log in again with your Singpass.

questionListItems.title: I am holding onto a few PAssion cards. At times, the perks are different. Am I able to select the card to be displayed in the app?

answer.body: Under the e-Card module, you have the option of selecting and displaying the PAssion e-Card of your choice.
